column1: Bosscat Kitchen & Libations////I like this bar because it's close to where I live. Its in a great location. I think this bar is trying to go for a speak easy look
column2: but it confuses me with the sports tv and loud music. They need to work on keeping the tables and bars cleaner
column3: and quicker. The bathroom attendant is a nice touch. Its a easy spot for company mixers.
